title: RDS cluster storing credit card data must have encryption enabled for PCI-DSS compliance
stealth_technique: Developer prioritized quick deployment over security, relying on default settings

title: S3 bucket containing sensitive transaction logs lacks encryption
stealth_technique: Developer assumed logs were less sensitive than primary transaction data

title: Security group allows unrestricted inbound access to Lambda function
stealth_technique: Temporary testing configuration left in production code

title: No access logging configured for sensitive transaction data bucket
stealth_technique: Logging considered optional feature rather than security requirement

title: Combination of unencrypted database, overly permissive security group, and Lambda VPC access creates elevated risk
stealth_technique: Each component configured by different teams without holistic security review
